original_text: And he had in his hand a little book open: and he set his right foot upon the sea, and his left foot on the earth,
korean_text: 그 손에는 펴 놓인 작은 두루마리를 들고 그 오른 발은 바다를 밟고 왼 발은 땅을 밟고

sentences.original_text: And he had in his hand a little book open:
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 손에는 작은 책이 열려 있었고

sentences.original_text: and he set his right foot upon the sea,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 오른발을 바다 위에 두었고

sentences.original_text: and his left foot on the earth,
